 038:     """
 039:     Dispatch hue array-border interpolation based on coord layout.
 040:     
 041:     Args:
 042:         line0: First hue line, shape (L,)
 043:         line1: Second hue line, shape (L,)
 044:         coords: Coordinate array, shape (H, W, 2) or (N, 2)
 045:         border_array: Border values, shape matching coords grid
 046:         mode_x: Hue interpolation mode for X axis (int enum)
 047:         mode_y: Hue interpolation mode for Y axis (int enum)
 048:         border_mode: Border handling mode (int enum)
 049:         border_feathering: Feathering distance
 050:         feather_hue_mode: Hue interpolation mode for feathering blend (int enum)
 051:         distance_mode: Distance metric for feathering (int enum)
 052:         num_threads: Number of threads (-1 for auto)
 053:         x_discrete: If True, use nearest-neighbor x-sampling
 054:     
 055:     Returns:
 056:         Interpolated hue values with shape matching coords grid
 057:     
 058:     Note:
